Council_Bluffs.Lowe Avenue Presbyterian Church Omaha:
Lowe Avenue Presbyterian Church was a church in the Omaha, Nebraska.
Founded in 1887, the church was built in 1906 at 1023 N 40th Street in the Walnut Hill neighborhood. Situated on the Southeast corner of 40th and Nicholas Streets, the church was organized on July 3, 1887, by a meeting of the people living near West Hamilton Street.
